title: Virgin Islands Coral Reef National Monument: Join Our Friends
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park     Join Our Friends              Join Our Friends       The “Friends of Virgin Islands National Park” has become a valuable private sector partner to Virgin Islands Coral Reef National Monument. The Friends provide beneficial assistance by financially supporting educational programs, cultural and historic research, and various resource protection activities in the Park. To become involved, please contact the Friends at (340) 779-4940, or visit their website at www.friendsvinp.org for more information.
